original_text: In the past, powerful kings have ruled over Jerusalem and all the region west of the Euphrates river. They received many kinds of taxes from the people there.
korean_text: 옛적에는 예루살렘을 다스리는 큰 군왕들이 있어서 강 건너편 모든 땅이 그들에게 조공과 관세와 통행세를 다 바쳤도다

sentences.original_text: powerful kings have ruled over Jerusalem
and all the region west of the Euphrates river
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 유프라테스 강 서쪽의 모든 지역을

sentences.original_text: They received many kinds of taxes
